SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

net.entersol.gdbc
Class SqlStatment

java.lang.Object
  net.entersol.gdbc.SqlStatment

public abstract class SqlStatment
extends Object

This class creates sql statements that is ready to be sent by Gdbc the queries are two types: direct and indirect direct query is simple, it just send plain sql from client to server, indirect queries are queries saved in the server as array the client just send index and complementary arguments

The format of the sending string is like that "index#col; [complementary#col;]*" while complementary can be

  1. single field; example name
  2. multi fields; example name1#com; name2#com; name3
  3. single value; example value
  4. multi values; value#com; 'value'#com; value
  5. single equation; example 1) name #eql; value 2) name #gte; 'value'
  6. multi equations; example 1) `name` #nql; value #and; `name2` #nql; 'value1' 2) field #gth; 'val' #and; #not; #opr; field #gte; 33 #cpr;

for using these operators you can use available public fields of this class they should be in this format for security reasons

This class sends an object of Json to the Gdbc in this format 

  {
        method: string , //direct or indirect
        sql: string // the sql statement 
  }

onQuerySuccess

public abstract void onQuerySuccess(ResultSet result)
Called when service returned successfully This method will called if successful page with return 200 comes and without any programming error in the server service that is called.

Parameters:
message - The message that should be send to the service

onQueryFailure

public abstract void onQueryFailure(SqlException sqlex)
Called when the service failed to return successfully This method is called if there is a problem occurred to the service; problems like:
  1. disconnection of network
  2. wrong service call
  3. unauthorized call
  4. problems inside service itself

Parameters:
ioge - is an exception that provided by the connecter class to the caller class to identify problem type
